src:
FOTO: Tragedija brez primere: staršem se ni javila, Katarinino truplo potegnili iz jarka
Njena številka je bila nedosegljiva.
03 Nov 2019, 20:15 by P. K.
KOTEZI – Gorski reševalci so v nedeljo popoldne iz jarka izvlekli truplo študentke Katarine Butrica iz Dubrovnika, ki je z avtom zdrsnila v obcestni jarek. Iskalno akcijo je sprožila njena družina po tem, ko se ni javljala na mobilni telefon. Iskanja so se lotili tudi prek družbenih omrežij in niti v najhujši nočni mori si niso znali predstavljati, kaj se je v resnici zgodilo.​Katarina je sicer študirala v Mostarju, tja se je tudi vračala iz domačega Dubrovnika. S svojim citroenom je s ceste zletela v jarek in umrla na kraju nesreče, poroča 24sata.Avto so skupaj z njenim truplom potegnili iz 60 metrov globokega brezna. Akcija je potekala v sodelovanju z gorskimi reševalci iz Bosne in Hercegovine.
text:
PHOTO: An Unprecedented Tragedy: Parents Didn't Report
Her number was out of reach.
03 Nov 2019, 20:15 by P.K.
KOTEZI - Mountain rescuers pulled a corpse of student Katarina Butrica from Dubrovnik on Sunday afternoon, who slid into a roadside ditch with her car. The search campaign was launched by her family after not answering her cellphone. They also searched through social networks, and even in their worst nightmare they could not imagine what had actually happened, although Katherine studied in Mostar and returned from her home town of Dubrovnik. She crashed into a ditch with her citroen from the road and died at the scene of the crash, 24 hours reported. The action was carried out in cooperation with mountain rescuers from Bosnia and Herzegovina.
